summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (17 ties). Key relationship types: interaction.
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (17), Avdotya Romanovna (9), Sonia Marmeladov (7), Pyotr Petrovich Luzhin (6)
story_summary: Raskolnikov, feeling anxious and paranoid, retrieves items he had hidden after a crime and decides to dispose of them. He wanders along the canal, contemplating how to hide the evidence, ultimately finding a secluded spot to bury the items under a stone. After burying them, he experiences a moment of relief but is soon overwhelmed by feelings of loathing and confusion about his actions.
